name: gfc
description: simple way to initialize a new git repository in an empty directory, add a file and do a first commit (or skip that part in a directory with files). useful for unit tests and generators.
kwds: simple way to initialize a new git repository in an empty directory, add a file and do a first commit (or skip that part in a directory with files). useful for unit tests and generators. add commit first first-commit git git-add git-commit git-init init
